category: news
title: "DXwand raises $4mln from UAE, Egypt investors to scale AI platform"
excerpt: "Artificial intelligence (AI) start-up DXwand, which operates out of Cairo and Dubai, has raised $4 million to scale up its operations in the region. The Series A equity round, which saw participation from existing investor Dubai Future District Fund, was led by UAE-based Shorooq Partners and Egypt-based Algebra Ventures."
